message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be very valuable to you.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $11,000 for it.

Bob, I understand your position.  While I'd like to get closer to my asking price, I'm willing to come down to $11,250.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident it's a good deal for you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose an offer of $11,100.
